title: 820-00840 screen backlight goes off if no charger
message:
Hi There,
This is the first time i had to fix a screen backlight circuit on this model and i have a very weird issue.

The backlight driver was badly damaged with many traces around it. Measuring continuity on the sense circuit from one side of the board to the other seems to be connected.

If I have the charger connected and turn on the device it works fine. If I disconnect the charger it still works fine. I can control the screen backlight and open and close the lid it still works.

If I shut down the device and turn it on without the charger connected almost always the screen backlight is off. Increasing it in the OS doesn't fix it. In this state if i connect a charger it comes on immediately and if I disconnect it, it stays on.
Any idea what can be causing this and what should i check?

title: 820-00840 screen backlight goes off if no charger
message:
Do PRAM reset 2-3 times first.
Possibly issue with Hall sensors.

title: 820-00840 screen backlight goes off if no charger
message:
I replaced the audio cable, no difference
The hall sensor on the board looks flawless 
I am not sure if possible to measure with the board in the top case

Pram didn't help

title: 820-00840 screen backlight goes off if no charger
message: Check exact level for LID_OPEN and SMC_LID_LEFT/RIGHT when backlight goes off.
